summary: A young breakdancer hits his head during a talent show and slips into a coma for twenty years. Waking up in 2006, he looks to revive his and his team's career with the help of his girlfriend and his parents.
cast: Jamie Kennedy|Maria Menounos|Miguel A. Núñez Jr.|Michael Rosenbaum|Christopher McDonald|Debra Jo Rupp|Bobby Lee|Aris Alvarado|Alan Ruck|Jesse 'Casper' Brown|Stuart Stone|Vivica A. Turner|Richard O'Sullivan|Shannon Vaisler|Anna Dillman|Emily Scorse|Brooklyn Chang|Lakota Huffman|Leah Cairns|Bill Mondy|Terri Anne Welyki|Sevrin Boyd|Adrienne Chan|Sara Fenton|Menina Fortunato|D.J. Goertzen|Jhaymee Hizon|Jheric Hizon|Kelly Konno|Simon Marlow|Jaayda McClanahan|Meisha Lee|Jennifer Oleksiuk|Laurin Elizabeth Padolina|Alex Pesusich|Joanne Pesusich|Luca 'Lazylegs' Patuelli|Harj Rai|Kim Sato|Matt Ward|Michael Ward|Jonathan 'Havoc' Woods|Reza Zadeh|Roddy Piper
title: Al Ritmo del Breakdance
